org.numenta.nupic.util

Interface Matrix<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - element type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FlatMatrix<T>, SparseMatrix<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFlatMatrix, AbstractSparseBinaryMatrix, AbstractSparseMatrix, BitSetMatrix, FastConnectionsMatrix, FlatArrayMatrix, LowMemorySparseBinaryMatrix, SetSparseMatrix, SparseBinaryMatrix, SparseObjectMatrix

    public interface Matrix<T>
    Base interface for Matrices.
    Author:
    Jose Luis Martin.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T get(int... index)
      Gets element at supplied index.
      int[] getDimensions()
      Returns the array describing the dimensionality of the configured array.
      int getNumDimensions()
      Returns the configured number of dimensions.
      Matrix<T> set(int[] index, T value)
      Puts an element to supplied index.
